title: Certain miscellany works of the Right Honourable Francis Lord Verulam, Viscount St. Alban published by VVilliam Ravvley ...
author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
publisher: Printed by T.J. for H.R., and are to be sold by Wil. Lee ...,
notes: First published in 1629. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Each part except the first has special t.p. with slightly varying imprint: Printed by J.M. for Humphrey Robinson, 1670.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
